title: eNNip-pAraDi kaNNan padam tannil
sahitya:
eNNip-pAraDDi kaNNan padam tannil shEraDi idayam tannil 
tavamAnadu udayam pera yadukula tilakan sannidhiyum pera


anupallavi

  paNNishaiyum kuzhalUdum paraman karuNaiyaiyum anda 
paraman karuNai sheyyum pakkuvam taNaiyum nanrAi


caraNam    nAradar tumburu jnAna sukar pADum nAda gItangaLai kETTAn ippO 
nAmum pADum inda rAga gItangaLai nanrAgak-kETTu tALam pOTTAn 
dhIramuDan veghu tIya arakkargaLai tiruNamAga aDittu pOTTAn AnAl 
cinnam shiru kayiTrin teNNilaik-kATpaTTu sheidadai enrum mIramATTAn
				(madhyama kAlam)
tava nirai munivarukkAgiDa mATTn taruNiyar tannoDu naTanangaLiTTAn 
avanilai namakkenavAkkiDa mATTAn Ayarkula nanda gOpanadu vITTAn
